Row 18: 4-1. Home scored 4, away scored 1. More than 2 goals by home team. Sixth game counted.

So, I've identified six rows where either the home or away team scored more than 2 goals. Now I need to check if the claim says "only 6 games." The claim doesn't specify whether it's exactly six or at most six, but based on my count, there are exactly six instances.
